select sum( case when (staff.join_datetime is null or staff.join_datetime < #{date1} ) and (staff.leave_job_datetime is null or staff.leave_job_datetime >= #{date1}) then 1 else 0 end ) as month_start_peoples , sum( case when staff.join_datetime is not null and staff.join_datetime >= #{date1} and staff.join_datetime <= #{date2} then 1 else 0 end ) as month_join_peoples , sum( case when staff.leave_job_datetime is not null and staff.leave_job_datetime >= #{date1} and staff.leave_job_datetime <= #{date2} then 1 else 0 end ) as month_leave_peoples , sum( case when (staff.join_datetime is null or staff.join_datetime <= #{date2} ) and (staff.leave_job_datetime is null or staff.leave_job_datetime > #{date2}) then 1 else 0 end ) as month_end_peoples ,
sum( case when (staff.confirmation_date is not null and staff.confirmation_date >= #{date1} and staff.confirmation_date <= #{date2} ) then 1 else 0 end ) as month_confirmation_peoples
from tb_staff_costs staff where 1 = 1
<if test="outsource_staff != null and outsource_staff != ''"> AND staff.outsource_staff = #{outsource_staff} </if>

select count(DISTINCT wa.staff_id) as month_work_attendance_peoples from tb_staff_costs staff join tb_work_attendance wa on staff.staff_id = wa.staff_id where wa.verify_userid is not null and attendance_month = #{month} <if test="outsource_staff != null and outsource_staff != ''"> AND staff.outsource_staff = #{outsource_staff} </if>

select count(*) as month_salary_peoples, sum(salary.actual_salary) as month_salary_amount , sum(salary.should_salary)/count(*) as month_average_salary_amount from tb_staff_costs staff join tb_salary salary on staff.staff_id = salary.staff_id where salary.verify_userid is not null and salary_month = #{month} <if test="outsource_staff != null and outsource_staff != ''"> AND staff.outsource_staff = #{outsource_staff} </if>

select count(*) as month_insurance_fund_peoples from tb_staff_costs staff join tb_insurance insurance on staff.staff_id = insurance.staff_id where insurance.verify_userid is not null and salary_month = #{month} <if test="outsource_staff != null and outsource_staff != ''"> AND staff.outsource_staff = #{outsource_staff} </if>
